00037 template <class T1,class T2>
00038 inline bool RTMCopy(MatrixT<T1> &dest, const MatrixT<T2> &src){
00039     if (dest.m != src.m) return False;
00040     if (dest.n != src.n) return False;
00041 
00042     uint32 sz = src.DataSize();
00043     RTM__vecCopy(dest.data,src.data,sz);
00044 
00045     return True;
00046 }
00047 
00049 template <class T1,class T2>
00050 inline bool RTMLoad(MatrixT<T1> &dest,const T2 *src, const uint32 nRows,const uint32 nColumns){
00051     if (dest.m != nColumns) return False;
00052     if (dest.n != nRows) return False;
00053 
00054     uint32 sz = dest.DataSize();
00055     RTM__vecCopy(dest.data,src,sz);
00056 
00057     return True;
00058 }
00059 
00061 template <class T1,class T2>
00062 inline bool RTMSave(MatrixT<T1> &src,T2 *dest, const uint32 nRows,const uint32 nColumns){
00063     if (src.m != nColumns) return False;
00064     if (src.n != nRows) return False;
00065 
00066     uint32 sz = src.DataSize();
00067     RTM__vecCopy(dest,src.data,sz);
00068     return True;
00069 }

00071 #if defined (MATRIX_BOUNDARY_CHECK)
00072     static char matrixScratch[16];
00073 #endif
00074 
00076 template <class T>
00077 class MatrixRow{
00079     T *row;
00081     int m;
00082 public:
00084     inline MatrixRow(T *row,int m){
00085         this->row = row;
00086         this->m   = m;
00087     }
00089     inline T &operator[](int col)const{
00090 #if defined (MATRIX_BOUNDARY_CHECK)
00091         if  ((col<0) || (col>=m)){
00092             CStaticAssertErrorCondition(ParametersError,"Matrix boundary violation: (row ptr=%x) column index = %i [0:%i)",row,col,m);
00093             return (T &)matrixScratch;
00094         }
00095         if (row == NULL)
00096             return (T &)matrixScratch;
00097 #endif
00098         return row[col];
00099     }
00100 };

00104 template <class T>
00105 class MatrixT: public RTMatrixT<T> {
00106 public:
00107 
00109     void ReSize(uint32 nRows,uint32 nColumns){
00110         MAReAllocate(*this,nRows,nColumns);
00111     }
00112 
00114     inline MatrixT(){
00115         this->Initialize();
00116     }
00117 
00119     inline MatrixT(uint32 nRows,uint32 nColumns){
00120         this->Allocate(nRows,nColumns);
00121     }
00122 
00124     inline MatrixT(uint32 nRows,uint32 nColumns,const T *source){
00125         this->Allocate(nRows,nColumns);
00126         uint32 sz = this->DataSize();
00127         RTM__vecCopy(this->data,source,sz);
00128     }
00129 
00131     inline MatrixT(const RTMatrixT<T> &A){
00132         *this = A;
00133     }
00134 
00136     inline MatrixT(const MatrixT &A){
00137         *this = A;
00138     }
00139 
00141     inline ~MatrixT(){
00142         this->DeAllocate();
00143     }
00144 
00146     inline MatrixT &operator=(const RTMatrixT<T> &A){
00147         MAReAllocate(*this,A.NRows(),A.NColumns());
00148         uint32 sz = A.DataSize();
00149         RTM__vecCopy(this->data,A.data,sz);
00150         return *this;
00151     }
00152 
00154     inline MatrixT &operator=(const MatrixT<T> &A){
00155         MAReAllocate(*this,A.NRows(),A.NColumns());
00156         uint32 sz = A.DataSize();
00157         RTM__vecCopy(this->data,A.data,sz);
00158         return *this;
00159     }
00160 
00162     inline const MatrixRow<T> operator[](int rowNo){
00163 #if defined (MATRIX_BOUNDARY_CHECK)
00164         if ((rowNo <0) || (rowNo>=n)){
00165             CStaticAssertErrorCondition(ParametersError,"Matrix %x boundary violation: row index = %i [0:%i) ",this,rowNo,n);
00166             return MatrixRow<T>(NULL,m);
00167         }
00168 #endif
00169         return MatrixRow<T>(this->row[rowNo],this->m);
00170     }
00171 
00173     inline bool operator*=(const RTMatrixT<T> &A){
00174         MatrixT temp = *this;
00175         MAReAllocate(*this,temp.NRows(),A.NColumns());
00176         RTMProduct_U(*this,temp,A);
00177         return True;
00178     }
00179 
00181     inline void operator*=(T x){
00182         Scale(x);
00183     }
00184 
00186     inline bool const operator+=(const RTMatrixT<T> &A){
00187         MAReAllocate(*this,A.NRows(),A.NColumns());
00188         RTMSum_U(*this,*this,A);
00189         return True;
00190     }
00191 
00193     inline bool operator-=(const RTMatrixT<T> &A){
00194         MAReAllocate(*this,A.NRows(),A.NColumns());
00195         RTMDiff_U(*this,*this,A);
00196         return True;
00197     }
00198 
00199 };

00204 template<class T>
00205 inline const MatrixT<T> operator*(const RTMatrixT<T> &A,const RTMatrixT<T> &B){
00206     MatrixT<T> res;
00207     if (A.NColumns() != B.NRows()) return res;
00208     MAReAllocate(res,A.NRows(),B.NColumns());
00209     RTMProduct_U(res,A,B);
00210     return res;
00211 }

00214 template<class T>
00215 inline const MatrixT<T> operator*(const RTMatrixT<T> &A,T x){
00216     MatrixT<T> res = A;
00217     res.Scale(x);
00218     return res;
00219 }

00224     MatrixT<T> res = A;

00226     return res;

00230 template<class T>
00231 inline const MatrixT<T> operator+(const RTMatrixT<T> &A,const RTMatrixT<T> &B){
00232     MatrixT<T> res(A.NRows(),A.NColumns());
00233     RTMSum_U(res,A,B);
00234     return res;
00235 }
00236 
00238 template<class T>
00239 inline const MatrixT<T> operator-(const RTMatrixT<T> &A,const RTMatrixT<T> &B){
00240     MatrixT<T> res(A.NRows(),A.NColumns());
00241     RTMDiff_U(res,A,B);
00242     return res;
00243 }
00244 
00246 template<class T>
00247 const MatrixT<T> operator/(T a,const RTMatrixT<T> &A){
00248     MatrixT<T> res;
00249     if (A.NRows() != A.NColumns()) return res;
00250     MAReAllocate(res,A.NRows(),A.NColumns());
00251     MatrixT<T> temp=A;
00252     if (RTMInvert_U(res,temp)==False){
00253         res.DeAllocate();
00254         return res;
00255     }
00256     res.Scale(a);
00257     return res;
00258 }
00259 
00261 template<class T>
00262 inline const MatrixT<T> operator/(const RTMatrixT<T> &A,const RTMatrixT<T> &B){
00263     MatrixT<T> res;
00264     if (B.NRows() != B.NColumns()) return res;
00265     if (A.NColumns() != B.NRows()) return res;
00266     MatrixT<T> temp=B;
00267     MatrixT<T> temp2(B.NRows(),B.NColumns());
00268     if ( RTMInvert_U(temp2,temp) == False){
00269         res.DeAllocate();
00270         return res;
00271     }
00272     MAReAllocate(res,A.NRows(),A.NColumns());
00273     RTMProduct_U(res,A,temp2);
00274     return res;
00275 }
00276 
00278 template<class T>
00279 inline const MatrixT<T> operator~(const RTMatrixT<T> &A){
00280     MatrixT<T> res;
00281     MAReAllocate(res,A.NColumns(),A.NRows());
00282     RTMTranspose_U(res,A);
00283     return res;
00284 }

00297 #define rows_of(a) (sizeof(a)/sizeof(a[0]))
00298 
00300 #define columns_of(a) (sizeof(a[0])/sizeof(a[0][0]))
00301 
00303 inline bool ReadRTMatrixF(ConfigurationDataBase &cdb_,MatrixF &matrix,const char *configName){
00304     CDBExtended &cdb = (CDBExtended &)cdb_;
00305 
00306     int size[4];
00307     int maxDim = 4;
00308     if (!cdb->GetArrayDims(size,maxDim,configName,CDBAIM_Strict)) return False;
00309     if (maxDim > 2){
00310 //            CStaticAssertErrorCondition(-1,"ReadRTMatrixF: too many dimensions to load into RTMatrix");
00311         return False;
00312     }
00313     if (size[0] == 0) size[0] = 1;
00314     if (size[1] == 0) size[1] = 1;
00315     matrix.ReSize(size[0],size[1]);
00316     return cdb.ReadFloatArray(matrix.data,size,maxDim,configName);
00317 }
